      • getInput

        static int getInput(Integer min,
                    Integer max,
                    String outOfRangePrompt)
        Helper function to get int input that is valid and within range from user
        Parameters:
        min - Minimum value
        max - Maximum value
        outOfRangePrompt - Prompt to print if out of range, if null prints "Must be within the range of "+min+" and "+max+", try again"
        Returns:
        input
